title: Cinema Symbolism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/16/21
itunes:title: Cinema Symbolism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/16/21
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and author Robert Sullivan explore the secret messages in famous movies like Fight Club, The Matrix, The Shining and Eyes Wide Shut, and how filmmakers like Stanley Kubrick tried to pass along messages about 9/11, the moon landing and the Illuminati.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
